channel.title: Knight-Mozilla OpenNews
channel.description: The blog for the Knight-Mozilla OpenNews project

item.title: 2015 Fellowship Onboarding is GO
item.description: The OpenNews team brings our 2015 Knight-Mozilla Fellows to Los Angeles to start the work of their fellowship years. We also welcome Kavya Sukumar as our seventh 2015 fellow, who will spend her fellowship year working with Vox Media. Yay fellows! Yay Los Angeles!
